dontClose.line1: Don't close this page / popup until the payment gets confirmed!
dontClose.popupInfo:
In case You will leave the page / popup earlier, then You'll need to wait longer for the payment validation.

If there will be no confirmation, and You'll still be charged then don't renew the payment - it will be checked automatically.

content.line1: We are NOT saving Your request data in our database / system, this information might (and most likely are) saved on the payment provider servers - and there is nothing we can do about it.
content.line2: Please make sure to read the payment provider guides and rules.
content.line3: The only data that we store is the transaction response (we remove it after fixed amount of time), and the transaction id (this one is never removed).
